title: I cant play ranked anymore? What?
body:
Hey
I recently got some sort of penalty i dont know how long i cant play ranked for but i flamed this person ingame and i am sorry i dont know what to do
I got a message saying something and i was going to play ranked but i cant click the button
can some1 help please

replies.body: Currently, this account only has a chat restriction on it, so you should still be able to play ranked. If the play button isn't working, it could likely be connection related. Check out the steps on Port Forwarding and DNS settings in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some troubleshooting steps, but be sure to test those in a custom game first.

Hey
thanks for the reply
Before i got the chat restriction message i got a message saying something with me not being able to play ranked. i got really scared so please help me out how can i get out of this situation i really want to play ranked. can you scan my account and check?
